notes.text: Pre-compaction #17 state flush. CRITICAL FIX COMPLETE: Root cause of ALL session deaths = BMAD agents not registered in openclaw.json agents.list. Added 17 agents (5 core, 7 BMM, 4 CIS, 1 TEA). Gateway restarted 18:46/18:48. NoteLite immediately spawned 10 successful code reviews at 18:47. System now autonomous. This single config issue caused 6+ hours of troubleshooting (spawn field confusion, gateway restart hunting, heartbeat debugging - all red herrings). Actual fix: 2 lines of JSON.

Pre-compaction #16 state flush. Research Lead 2 completed (Ripple iOS app, 18:41 CST, 46/50 score). Dashboard death loop continues (18:30, 18:39, 18:42 restarts) - suspected cause: Research Details page bug throwing unhandled errors when clicking active RL sessions. Bug reports filed for kelly-dashboard: Bug 1 (Research Details active session detection) + Bug 2 (event handlers - already fixed). Project Lead kelly-dashboard exists but times out on messages. Three research ideas ready: Prepwise (46/50), ClaimDone (43/50), Ripple (46/50). Awaiting operator implementation decision.

Pre-compaction #15 state flush. NoteLite heartbeat bug discovered: only checks ready-for-dev, misses ready-for-review â†’ 8min idle periods. Manual kick at 18:35 spawned 10 code reviews. Project Lead will fix heartbeat logic post-wave. Dashboard rehosted at 18:39 (localhost:3000). ClaimDone intake copied to Sync folder. Multiple session death/recovery cycles throughout afternoon (subagents keep dying, heartbeat auto-recovers).

Pre-compaction #14 state flush. Fixed NoteLite blocker: Added Project Lead spawn allowlist (7 BMAD agents) + 60s heartbeat for auto-recovery. Gateway restarted 2x (17:47, 17:52). NoteLite PL resumed at 17:53, spawned story 2.3 code review. ClaimDone research completed (17:43) - second product idea. Two strong ideas ready: Prepwise (46/50 shopping list budget), ClaimDone (43/50 warranty claim concierge).
